message.content:
Step 1. Calculate Free Cash Flow (FCF)  
FCF = Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities + Net Cash Flow from Investing Activities  
  = (–6,856,840.58) + (–666,078.18)  
  = –7,522,918.76  

Step 2. Calculate Return on Assets (ROA)  
First, calculate the average total assets:  
  Average Total Assets = (Beginning Total Assets + Ending Total Assets) / 2  
  Beginning Total Assets = 13,000,000.00 (from initial amounts)  
  Ending Total Assets = 12,566,098.56  
  Average Total Assets = (13,000,000.00 + 12,566,098.56) / 2  
    = 25,566,098.56 / 2  
    ≈ 12,783,049.28  

Next, using the net profit from the income statement:  
  Net Profit = –2,035,736.52  
Then,  
  ROA = (Net Profit / Average Total Assets) × 100  
    = (–2,035,736.52 / 12,783,049.28) × 100  
    ≈ –15.92%  

Step 3. Calculate Return on Equity (ROE)  
First, calculate the average owner’s equity:  
  Beginning Owner’s Equity = 13,000,000.00  
  Ending Owner’s Equity = 10,964,263.48  
  Average Owner’s Equity = (13,000,000.00 + 10,964,263.48) / 2  
    = 23,964,263.48 / 2  
    ≈ 11,982,131.74  

Then,  
  ROE = (Net Profit / Average Owner’s Equity) × 100  
    = (–2,035,736.52 / 11,982,131.74) × 100  
    ≈ –16.98%  

Step 4. Calculate Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio  
Ratio = Operating Cash Flow / Net Profit  
Using the absolute values (since both are negative, the ratio is positive):  
  Ratio = 6,856,840.58 / 2,035,736.52  
    ≈ 3.37  

Step 5. Calculate Net Profit Margin  
Net Profit Margin = (Net Profit / Total Revenue) × 100  
  Total Revenue = 6,836,701.10  
  Net Profit Margin = (–2,035,736.52 / 6,836,701.10) × 100  
    ≈ –29.78%  

Step 6. Calculate Gross Profit Margin  
Gross Profit Margin = (Gross Profit / Total Revenue) × 100  
  Gross Profit = 1,136,701.10  
  Gross Profit Margin = (1,136,701.10 / 6,836,701.10) × 100  
    ≈ 16.63%

Thus, the final computed values are:

{
  "solution": {
    "Free Cash Flow (FCF)": "-7522918.76",
    "Return on Assets (ROA)": "-15.92%",
    "Return on Equity (ROE)": "-16.98%",
    "Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio": "3.37",
    "Net Profit Margin": "-29.78%",
    "Gross Profit Margin": "16.63%"
  }
}
